channel.title: Posts on Htzhu's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Htzhu's blog

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: 1、Hugo Install brew install hugo # check it hugo version 2、Create a Blog hugo new site [path] 3、Create a article # cd [path],create a article hugo new post/hello-hugo.md 4、Set Theme Reference Hugo Website , choose a theme. # cd [path],and clone it git clone https://github.com...... Set up config.toml file, for example: baseURL = "http://example.org/" languageCode = "en-us" title = "Htzhu's blog" # your theme's name theme = "m10c" 5、Start it hugo server -D
